name: facebook-ad-builder
description: This is a project to learn the basics of AngularJS 1.x. It is a simple ad builder for Facebook that includes a way to pick images (picking from a pre-canned list), and edit text for the various components of the ad.  Data into a preview that updates live as the fields are edited and very closely match what is [on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/business/ads-guide).
